transcript.text: whatup guys out here at the dimensions
of disclosure conference in Loveland
Colorado right now you see beautiful
view and this is why I haven't really
been posting too much on YouTube the
past couple days but don't worry give it
a couple more days I'll get back to the
regular routine still wanted to check in
here and give you guys a video and the
topic of this video is going to be on
the most optimal timeline you see this
morning during my workshop and my
workshop was a hike you know I didn't
want to sit in a stuffy room talking to
people I was like hey why not just do a
hike and that'll be my workshop and it
was fantastic and we had some great
conversations during the walk and one of
those conversations was on the idea of
the most optimal timeline now if you're
asking yourself well what exactly does
that mean
it is a idea mainly in the spiritual
communities people who understand the
idea of the co-creative consciousness
and what the thought of it manifesting
that optimal timeline means is basically
when you are visualizing using your
co-creative consciousness to try to
manifest the best timeline the best
future for yourself now if you get
multiple people together and all of
their thoughts linked up all of their
co-creative consciousnesses in sync well
they have a much greater capacity to
manifest a optimal timeline for
everybody involved so that's the idea of
what co-creating the most optimal
timeline is but during this conversation
it got the wheels turning in my head
right and I was asking myself what does
the most optimal timeline exactly mean
and the reason I say that is because I
usually find then when people are
talking about manifesting the most
optimal timeline what they're talking
about is manifesting the timeline
manifesting a future from now till you
know some point ahead of ourselves that
is the easiest right that makes them the
happiest they want to manifest that
timeline for themselves
that's the smoothest ride okay
now there's nothing wrong with that I
mean it's good to want things to be easy
to get through these very turbulent
times we are in smoothly but what you
gotta understand is and I'm gonna drop
an old adage here that I love smooth
seas never made a skilled sailor right
and what I brought up in that
conversation earlier was the fact that
sometimes on that most optimal timeline
it's gonna get rough it's gonna get
rough and tough and be full of
challenges now if your ego is doing your
thinking for you you might say to
yourself that's not the most optimal
timeline because it's tough and it sucks
and I don't want to deal with that right
well here's the thing
challenge is the only thing that
stimulates growth okay with a most
optimal timeline do you want that
timeline to make you into somebody who
is skillful and conscious and aware and
is a very high-performing human or do
you want that timeline to make you into
somebody who is along for the easy ride
right who just wants things done for
themselves doesn't want to have the
skills to be able to do them or do it
for yourself you see what I'm saying so
when thinking of that most optimal
timeline think of something that's yeah
going to get maybe all of us free get
these powers that be you know done for
but a timeline that's going to stimulate
us to grow and don't always think maybe
you're in a tough situation right now
right and it doesn't seem like it's the
most optimal timeline for you but later
on in the future you might look back at
these challenges you're facing right now
and realize like oh my god that's
exactly what I needed at that point in
time to grow the example I used this
morning in the conversation was being in
a relationship with somebody something
that everybody can relate to maybe
you're in a relationship that really
sucks and at this particular point you
know you think like oh this is
definitely not what I want for myself in
my life
for example three years ago myself I was
in a pretty shitty relationship you know
two three years ago and it was not fun
now I got out of that relationship and
during those times I was like man this
is like not the you know quote most
optimal timeline for myself that I
wanted but here's the thing if I never
would have went through that if that
relationship never ended right I
wouldn't be here I wouldn't be doing
this YouTube thing I wouldn't be talking
to thousands tens of thousands hundreds
of thousands of people and doing what I
do now so looking back I was creating
the most optimal timeline for myself in
that moment but in that moment seemed
like it really sucks and it seemed at
that instant like I wasn't see what I'm
saying so understand that the most
optimal timeline at this moment might
suck but it's gonna harden you into a
much more conscious much more aware much
more skilled human okay so it's all
dependent on how you view things
remember it's all perspective it might
suck it might seem negative now but that
negativity you're facing in your life
might be what is the most optimal
timeline for you okay
so use that co-creative consciousness
always look at every single situation
you're in in a particular light that is
going to make you grow because the
universe grows that is one of nature's
laws we grow okay nature grows life it
grows plants we grow consciousness goes
through levels of a growth first entity
second density third fourth density
higher than that right so negative or
positive I think we're always on that
optimal timeline it just depends on what
you are choosing how you are choosing to
look at it
